newsitem.title: SOUTH KOREA: S.Korean yields end unchanged, BOK absorbs money.
newsitem.headline: S.Korean yields end unchanged, BOK absorbs money.

text.p: Yields on three-year corporates closed flat on Monday as buying stemming from ample liquidity in the financial community was offset by selling pressure from heavy new issues and the central bank's money absorption. brokers said.
The Bank of Korea said it absorbed 1.4 trillion won through repurchase agreements. Three-month CDs and overnight call rate also closed unchanged in thin trading, they said.
* 3-yr corporates end flat at Saturday's 12.19 pct
* Overnight call average 12.19 pct, unchanged from Saturday
The Bank of Korea said it absorbed 1.4 trillion won from the banking system through repurchase agreements.
Brokers forecast similar trading patterns on Tuesday in the absence of fresh factors.
Three-month CDs and the overnight call rate also closed unchanged in slow trading, they said.
